media-selection-dialog.title: Set the index range to select the media (#{min} - #{max})

q-status.server-unconnectable: Server cannot be connected to and might be offline..

account-token-validate-dialog.invalid-token: The token was invalid and/or has expired.
account-token-validate-dialog.sub-header: The token: {authToken} belongs to the Plex account:
account-token-validate-dialog.title: Plex.tv Authentication Token Validation

add-connection-dialog.url-has-valid-format: Url is of a valid format!
add-connection-dialog.url-already-exists: This URL is already used for server: {serverName}

first-time-setup-dialog.setup-question: It looks like this is you're first time using PlexRipper, would you like to start the setup process?
first-time-setup-dialog.header: Need help with setting up PlexRipper?

delete-account.text:
This will delete this Plex account from PlexRipper! 

This will also delete all inaccessible Plex shared servers, Plex libraries and all media that is contained within. Any active downloads that are started or queued with this account will be canceled and deleted. Completed downloads will remain untouched.
delete-account.title: Are you sure?
delete-account.warning: This might take around 5 minutes or longer and then this window will close on its own!

hide-server.text: This will hide the server from view. You can unhide this server by going to settings -> UI -> Unhide Plex Servers
hide-server.title: Are you sure?

reset-db.text: This will back-up the current database to "config/Database Backup/" and create a new one, after which you will be redirected to the setup page. This will not reset settings since those are stored in "config/PlexRipperSettings.json"
reset-db.title: Are you sure?

skip-setup.text: This will skip the setup process and you will have to configure PlexRipper manually
skip-setup.title: Are you sure?

not-found.text: Could not find the correct confirmation text..
not-found.title: Could not find the correct confirmation text..

alerts.disabled-paths: Editing the paths is disabled when there are active downloads. Make sure all downloads are stopped or cleared!
alerts.invalid-directory: Directory is not a valid path!

auth-token.label: Authentication Token
auth-token.text: A way to avoid using your username and password and instead insert a Plex.tv Authentication token
auth-token.title: Plex.tv Authentication token

display-name.label: Display Name
display-name.text: The name used to display this account in the UI.
display-name.title: Display Name

is-enabled.label: Is Enabled
is-enabled.text: Should this account be used for downloading and retrieving data from the Plex Servers.
is-enabled.title: Is enabled

is-main.label: Is Main
is-main.text: A main account is the account which owns your Plex libraries. If a non-main account exists, which has access to the same Plex library of a shared Plex server as a main account, then that will be used first to protect the main account.
is-main.title: Is main

password.label: Password
password.text: The password of your Plex account.
password.title: Password

username.label: Username
username.text: The username of your Plex account
username.title: Username

default.label: Missing Label
default.text: The language path where this text is stored is incorrect
default.title: Unknown help

download-speed-limit.label: Download Speed Limit
download-speed-limit.text: This will limit the download speed for this Plex server in kilobytes per second. Setting this value to 0 will disable the limit.
download-speed-limit.title: Download Speed Limit

inspect-server.text: Inspecting the server will check all connections and check if all libraries are still accessible.
inspect-server.title: Inspecting the Plex server
inspect-server.label: Inspect Server

sync-server-libraries.text: This will re-sync all media data for each library in this Plex server.
sync-server-libraries.title: Re-sync Library media
sync-server-libraries.label: Re-sync Library media

download-segments.label: Download Segments
download-segments.text:
PlexRipper supports multi-threaded downloading and can divide the media that will be downloaded into different parts and download each part individually. This tends to increase the overall download speed but the downside is that it will require extra time to merge the different parts afterwards into one complete media file.

Setting this value to 1 will disable multi-threaded downloading and download the media file as one complete file. The number of download segments has no influence on the speed of the media file being merged.
download-segments.title: Download Segments

debug-mode.text: Enabling debug mode will display more information than usual in various area of the user interface.
debug-mode.title: Debug Mode
debug-mode.label: Debug Mode

mask-plex-libraries.label: Mask Plex Library Names
mask-plex-libraries.text: This will mask the names of Plex libraries in the UI. This is useful when taking anonymous screenshots
mask-plex-libraries.title: Mask Plex Library Names

mask-plex-servers.label: Mask Plex Server Names
mask-plex-servers.text: This will mask the names of Plex servers in the UI. This is useful when taking anonymous screenshots.
mask-plex-servers.title: Mask Plex Server Names

reset-db.label: Reset Database
reset-db.text: Resets the database and creates a back-up of the old one.
reset-db.title: Reset Database

go-to-setup-page.label: Go To Setup Page
go-to-setup-page.text: Will navigate to the PlexRipper setup page.
go-to-setup-page.title: Go To Setup Page

download-folder.label: Download Path
download-folder.text: The path all files will be downloaded to in multiple parts before being merged into one in their destination folder.
download-folder.title: Download Path

movie-folder.label: Movie Path
movie-folder.text: The default path of Movies when no custom destination has been selected.
movie-folder.title: Movie Path

tv-show-folder.label: TV-Show Path
tv-show-folder.text: The default path of TV-Show when no custom destination has been selected.
tv-show-folder.title: TV-Show Path

download-episode-confirmation.label: Ask Download Episode Confirmation
download-episode-confirmation.text: Should a confirmation pop-up be shown when an episode is about to be downloaded?
download-episode-confirmation.title: Ask Download Episode Confirmation

download-movie-confirmation.label: Ask Download Movie Confirmation
download-movie-confirmation.text: Should a confirmation pop-up be shown when a movie is about to be downloaded?
download-movie-confirmation.title: Ask Download Movie Confirmation

download-season-confirmation.label: Ask Download Season Confirmation
download-season-confirmation.text: Should a confirmation pop-up be shown when a season is about to be downloaded?
download-season-confirmation.title: Ask Download Season Confirmation

download-tvshow-confirmation.label: Ask Download TvShow Confirmation
download-tvshow-confirmation.text: Should a confirmation pop-up be shown when an tv show is about to be downloaded?
download-tvshow-confirmation.title: Ask Download TvShow Confirmation

language-selection.label: Language
language-selection.text: This will change the language to almost everything. Text such as errors are unlikely to be translated. Any translation fixes or new languages are greatly appreciated, check www.plexripper.rocks for information on how you can add new languages.
language-selection.title: Pick your preferred language

toggle-animated-background.label: Disable Animated Background
toggle-animated-background.text: The animated background can cause performance issues in the browser. This toggle can be disable the animation and show just a static background.
toggle-animated-background.title: Disable the background animation

hide-offline-servers.label: Don't show media from offline Plex servers:
hide-offline-servers.text: When enabled, media from currently offline Plex servers will be excluded from this media overview.
hide-offline-servers.title: Don't show media from offline Plex servers

hide-owned-media.label: Don't show media from owned Plex servers:
hide-owned-media.text: Hide all media in this overview that originates from Plex servers owned by a Plex account.
hide-owned-media.title: Don't show media from owned Plex servers

use-low-quality-poster-images.label: Use low quality poster images:
use-low-quality-poster-images.text: When enabled, lower-resolution images will be used for poster thumbnails, significantly improving loading speed while browsing Plex libraries.
use-low-quality-poster-images.title: Use low quality poster images

downloads.no-downloads: There are currently no downloads in progress

music-id.header: Music Libraries are unfortunately not yet supported :(

index.header: Music Libraries are unfortunately not yet supported :(

list.item-1: Give a star on the Github page!
list.item-2: Request features and provide bug reports!
list.item-4: Go through the code and give feedback or suggest improvements!

text.p-1: If you like this project and would like to show your appreciation then consider the following:

finished.title: You are now ready to start using PlexRipper!

list.item-1-1: Any searches for media can be redirected to PlexRipper, and PlexRipper will search all available servers, download the media and notify Radarr/Sonarr of the finished download.
list.item-6-1: Download collections, add to own Plex server and automatically copy over all Plex related settings and configurations.

list.item-1: PlexRipper is currently under active development, so there might be some bugs here and there. Please make sure to report any you may find on the Github issues page.
list.item-2: Feedback or feature requests are really appreciated! Especially on the source code as this is a personal project meant to improve my coding skills.
list.item-3: PlexRipper can download Movies and TvShows, other types such as music is currently not supported, but will in the future!
list.item-4: PlexRipper does not, and will not, collect any data about you or any of your activities. The only data that is sent to Plex is your username and password to authenticate your Plex account. After which, all communication is directly with the shared servers you have access to.
list.item-5: A word of caution: Plex, and maybe Plex server owners, do not like you to download all "their" 100% legally acquired copies of media. Which is why there are some safe guards in place to protect PlexRipper users from being banned by Plex. However, be respectful to Plex server owners by not taking up all their precious bandwidth and don't complain to me about being kicked of a server. In the future I would also like to protect Plex server owners from PlexRipper abuse, any ideas or input are welcome.

intro.title: You are awesome for trying out PlexRipper!

paths.title: Ensure that all paths are valid!

index.sub-header: Select a library from the left-hand side

index.header: Library {libraryName} is of an unknown type
